message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This is a great deal for both of us. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your proposal, but I believe we can find a better solution for both of us. I am willing to pay $1,350,000 for your product. I hope this meets your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value our negotiation, $1,350,000 is still a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and go with $1,375,000? This would be a fair deal for both of us, and it allows us to move forward.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position, but I still believe we can find a better solution. I am willing to pay $1,360,000 for your product. I hope this revised offer will be acceptable to you.
